## TreePropsBase interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TreePropsBase 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [contentButtonProps?](./components.treepropsbase.contentbuttonprops.md) |  | IButtonProps | <i>(Optional)</i> Override props for the main button used to render each tree item's content. Note that this includes the iconProps if you want to customize how the item's icon (if any) looks. |
|  [expandButtonProps?](./components.treepropsbase.expandbuttonprops.md) |  | ExpandIconButtonProps | <i>(Optional)</i> Override props to customize the expand/collapse button (including its styles). |
|  [menuButtonProps?](./components.treepropsbase.menubuttonprops.md) |  | MenuButtonProps | <i>(Optional)</i> Override props for the right-side menu item for each item (if they have menuItems). |
|  [narrow?](./components.treepropsbase.narrow.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Indicates that the Tree should be rendered in a narrow mode |
|  [size?](./components.treepropsbase.size.md) |  | [Size](./components.size.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Set the size mode of the tree |
|  [styles?](./components.treepropsbase.styles.md) |  | TreeStyles | <i>(Optional)</i> General styles for customizing the tree. |
